books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the final years of World War II.
books.name: KILLING THE RISING SUN

books.author: by J.D. Vance
books.description: A Yale Law School graduate looks at the struggles of the white working class through the story of his own childhood in the Rust Belt.
books.name: HILLBILLY ELEGY

books.author: by Glennon Doyle Melton
books.description: After her husband confesses to multiple infidelities, a woman struggles to grow — and so does he.
books.name: LOVE WARRIOR

books.author: by Amy Schumer
books.description: Humorous personal essays by the comedian, actor and writer.
books.name: THE GIRL WITH THE LOWER BACK TATTOO

books.author: by Carli Lloyd with Wayne Coffey
books.description: How the champion soccer player turned her career around in 2003.
books.name: WHEN NOBODY WAS WATCHING

books.author: by Candice Millard
books.description: The young Winston Churchill’s adventures in Africa during the Boer War, including an escape from captivity in 1899.
books.name: HERO OF THE EMPIRE

books.author: by Ron Chernow
books.description: A biography of the first Treasury secretary. Originally published in 2004 and the basis of the Broadway musical.
books.name: ALEXANDER HAMILTON

books.author: by Paul Kalanithi
books.description: A memoir by a physician who received a diagnosis of Stage IV lung cancer at the age of 36.
books.name: WHEN BREATH BECOMES AIR

books.author: by Daniel James Brown
books.description: The University of Washington’s eight-oar crew and their quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics.
books.name: THE BOYS IN THE BOAT

books.author: by Volker Ullrich
books.description: A new biography focuses on Hitler the man.
books.name: HITLER: ASCENT 1889-1939

books.author: by Elizabeth Vargas
books.description: The co-anchor of “World News Tonight” and “20/20” describes her long struggle with acute anxiety.
books.name: BETWEEN BREATHS

books.author: by Michael Savage
books.description: The radio host discusses what will happen after the administration of “President Maobama.”
books.name: SCORCHED EARTH

books.author: by Lin-Manuel Miranda and Jeremy McCarter
books.description: The libretto of the Grammy-, Tony- and Pulitzer Prize-winning musical, annotated by its creator, along with backstage photos and interviews with the cast.
books.name: HAMILTON: THE REVOLUTION

books.author: by Stacy Schiff
books.description: An account of the Salem witch trials of 1692.
books.name: THE WITCHES
